amendment.description: To provide for Department of Defense support of certain Paralympic sporting events.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1423 withdrawn in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Amendment SA 1423 proposed by Senator Salazar. (consideration: CR S8735-8738; text: CR S8736) To provide for Department of Defense support of certain Paralympic sporting events.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1423 proposed by Senator Salazar.
